DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: Finds a cover point from the specified target(s) given a point that cannot be see within the post spacing and within the given radius. The post spacing is defined in the descriptor of this controller. This task will be considered complete when all entities have sucessfully fleed

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>findCoverFrom</myVariableName> <myType>simulationobjects</myType> <myLabel>Find Cover From</myLabel> <myToolTip></myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>All Entities</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>DtAllEntitiesFilter</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>radius</myVariableName> <myType>range</myType> <myLabel>Radius:</myLabel> <myToolTip></myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>50</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>0</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
